oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Tribute - AES honors Nashville's Recording Engineer Pioneers - 2012-06-03
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Nashville chapter of the Audio Engineering Society pays tribute to the city's recording pioneers from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on June 3, 2012.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Master of ceremony is Michael Janas. Recording engineers honored are Gene Eichelberger, Lee Hazen, Bill Porter, Glenn Snoddy, and Mort Thomasson . Tributes from Clark Hagan; Kyle Lehning; Glenn Meadows; Gail Pollock; Mike Porter. Includes selected audio excerpts.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Nashville (Tenn.); Audio Engineering Society; audio engineers; Sound engineers--United States; Eichelberger, Gene; Hazen, Lee; Porter, Bill; Snoddy, Glenn; Thomasson, Mort;
